description:
As an admin user
  I want to interact with the Category API
  So that I can perform full CRUD operations on categories

elements.name: API_ADMIN_030 - Verify that an admin can retrieve all categories using correct parameter

steps.name: the API service is running
the admin has a valid authentication token
the admin sends a GET request to "/api/categories" with name parameter "Test"
the API should return HTTP status code 200
the response body should contain a list of categories matching the parameter
no error message should be returned

elements.name: API_ADMIN_031 - Verify that an admin can retrieve all categories without providing parameters

steps.name: the API service is running
the admin has a valid authentication token
the admin sends a GET request to "/api/categories" without parameters
the API should return HTTP status code 200
the response body should contain a list of all categories
no error message should be returned

elements.name: API_ADMIN_032 - Verify the API response when the admin provides invalid query parameters while retrieving categories

steps.name: the API service is running
the admin has a valid authentication token
the admin sends a GET request to "/api/categories" with invalid parameter "InvalidParam!@#"
the API should return HTTP status code 400 or empty result
if error, the response body should contain a clear error message indicating invalid parameter
no categories should be returned or empty list

elements.name: API_ADMIN_033 - Verify that an admin can successfully retrieve the summary of all categories

steps.name: the API service is running
the admin has a valid authentication token
the admin sends a GET request to "/api/categories/summary"
the API should return HTTP status code 200
the response body should contain category summary information
no error message should be returned

elements.name: API_ADMIN_034 - Verify that an admin can successfully retrieve all sub-categories when providing valid authorization

steps.name: the API service is running
the admin has a valid authentication token
the admin sends a GET request to "/api/categories/sub-categories"
the API should return HTTP status code 200
the response body should contain a list of all sub-categories with expected fields
no error message should be returned

elements.name: API_ADMIN_035 - Verify that an admin can successfully search categories by name or parent ID with Pagination and sorting using valid authorization

steps.name: the API service is running
the admin has a valid authentication token
the admin sends a GET request to "/api/categories/page" with page "0" and name parameter
the API should return HTTP status code 200
the response body should contain a paginated and sorted list
categories should match the search input
no error message should be returned

elements.name: API_ADMIN_036 - Verify that an admin can successfully retrieve main categories only when providing valid authorization

steps.name: the API service is running
the admin has a valid authentication token
the admin sends a GET request to "/api/categories/main"
the API should return HTTP status code 200
the response body should contain a list of main categories only
the returned categories should not contain sub-categories
no error message should be returned

elements.name: API_ADMIN_037 - Verify that an admin can successfully create a category by providing a valid name

steps.name: the API service is running
the admin has a valid authentication token
the admin sends a POST request to "/api/categories" with valid category name "APITest"
the API should return HTTP status code 201

result.error_message:
AssertionError [ERR_ASSERTION]: Expected status 201 but got 400. Response: {"details":{"name":"Category name must be between 3 and 10 characters"},"error":"BAD_REQUEST","message":"Validation failed","status":400,"timestamp":"2026-02-06T13:38:35.9836736"}

400 !== 201

    + expected - actual

    -400
    +201

    at CustomWorld.<anonymous> (C:\Users\zulfa\Downloads\Zulfaa-ITQA\qa-training-tests\api-test\step-definitions\common\commonApiSteps.js:18:10)

steps.name: the response body should contain newly created category details
the category should be saved successfully in the database
no error message should be returned

elements.name: API_ADMIN_038 - Verify that the API does not allow creating a category when the name field is missing or empty

steps.name: the API service is running
the admin has a valid authentication token
the admin sends a POST request to "/api/categories" with invalid request body
the API should return HTTP status code 400
the response body should contain a clear error message indicating invalid request body
no category should be created

name: Category API - Admin Operations

description:
As a regular user
  I want to interact with the Category API
  So that I can view categories but not modify them

elements.name: API_USER_018 - Verify the API response when retrieving all sub-categories with valid authorization

steps.name: the API service is running
the user has a valid authentication token
the user sends a GET request to "/api/categories/sub-categories"
the API should return HTTP status code 200
the response body should contain a list of all sub-categories
each sub-category should include expected fields
no error message should be returned

elements.name: API_USER_019 - Verify the API response when retrieving all sub-categories without authorization

steps.name: the API service is running
the user does not have an authentication token
the user sends a GET request to "/api/categories/sub-categories"
the API should return HTTP status code 401
the response body should contain a proper error message

elements.name: API_USER_020 - Verify the API response when searching by name or parent ID with Pagination and sorting using valid authorization

steps.name: the API service is running
the user has a valid authentication token
the user sends a GET request to "/api/categories/page" with pagination parameters
the API should return HTTP status code 200
the response body should contain a paginated and sorted list
categories should match the search input
no error message should be returned

elements.name: API_USER_021 - Verify the API response when searching by name or parent ID with Pagination and sorting without authorization

steps.name: the API service is running
the user does not have an authentication token
the user sends a GET request to "/api/categories/page" with pagination parameters
the API should return HTTP status code 401
the response body should contain a proper error message
no category data should be returned

elements.name: API_USER_022 - Verify the API response when retrieving main categories only using valid authorization

steps.name: the API service is running
the user has a valid authentication token
the user sends a GET request to "/api/categories/main"
the API should return HTTP status code 200
the response body should contain a list of main categories only
no sub-categories should be included
no error message should be returned

elements.name: API_USER_023 - Verify the API response when retrieving main categories only without authorization

steps.name: the API service is running
the user does not have an authentication token
the user sends a GET request to "/api/categories/main"
the API should return HTTP status code 401
the response body should contain a proper error message
no category data should be returned

elements.name: API_USER_024 - Verify that an authorized user is not allowed to update categories

steps.name: the API service is running
the user has a valid authentication token
the user sends a PUT request to "/api/categories/{id}" with category data
the API should return HTTP status code 403
the response body should contain a proper error message
the category details should not be updated

elements.name: API_USER_025 - Verify that an unauthorized user cannot update categories

steps.name: the API service is running
the user does not have an authentication token
the user sends a PUT request to "/api/categories/{id}" with category data
the API should return HTTP status code 401
the response body should contain a proper error message
the category should not be updated

elements.name: API_USER_026 - Verify that an authorized user is not allowed to delete a category

steps.name: the API service is running
the user has a valid authentication token
the user sends a DELETE request to "/api/categories/{id}"
the API should return HTTP status code 403
the response body should contain a proper error message
the category should not be deleted

elements.name: API_USER_027 - Verify that an unauthorized user cannot delete a category

steps.name: the API service is running
the user does not have an authentication token
the user sends a DELETE request to "/api/categories/{id}"
the API should return HTTP status code 401
the response body should contain a proper error message
the category should not be deleted

elements.name: API_USER_028 - Verify that an authorized user cannot create a new category

steps.name: the API service is running
the user has a valid authentication token
the user sends a POST request to "/api/categories" with category data
the API should return HTTP status code 403

result.error_message:
AssertionError [ERR_ASSERTION]: Expected status 403 but got 400. Response: {"details":{"name":"Category name must be between 3 and 10 characters"},"error":"BAD_REQUEST","message":"Validation failed","status":400,"timestamp":"2026-02-06T13:38:38.3070889"}

400 !== 403

    + expected - actual

    -400
    +403

    at CustomWorld.<anonymous> (C:\Users\zulfa\Downloads\Zulfaa-ITQA\qa-training-tests\api-test\step-definitions\common\commonApiSteps.js:18:10)

steps.name: the response body should contain a proper error message
the category should not be created

elements.name: API_USER_029 - Verify that an unauthorized user cannot create a new category

steps.name: the API service is running
the user does not have an authentication token
the user sends a POST request to "/api/categories" with category data
the API should return HTTP status code 401
the response body should contain a proper error message
the category should not be created

name: Category API - User Operations
